text: @ndrew_lawrence Contact tracing for things not contagious. Add the @realDonaldTrump new idea of injecting Lysol into the body to treat #Covid19 - really how stupid are these people? When will we hear the first case of someone listening to King Dr. Donald & drinking some disinfect cleaner & dying
